articles.title: What to expect at CES 2024 - The Verge
articles.description: CES 2024 kicks off on January 9th, 2024. Here’s what to expect from new TVs, auto tech, laptops, wearables, smart home gadgets, and more.
articles.content:
What to expect at CES 2024
